name: DynamicQRcode
author: TomTak Corp.

sections.changelog:
2.11.4

  • Initialization process:Added variable initialization processing
  • Add update log to readme.txt

2.11.8

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.4.3

2.11.9

  • bug fix
sections.description:
The unique QR code will be automatically created on each page of the website, and will contain the URL for each page specifically.
Once QR code is created, it will be placed as a button on the screen, or can be placed at your desired location by using shortcode.

Usage

After activating the plugin, setup can be performed via Dynamic QRcode in “Settings” from the side menu on the left pane.

Button

Switch displays: Switch displays on and off. It will not display even if the display setting is set to on if the screen size is below 600px.
Button background color: Hexadecimal is used to set the background color.
QR code color: Hexadecimal is used to set the color of the QR code.
QR code size: Set up the QR code size. It is unnecessary to enter a unit(px).
Alt attribute of QRcode: Alt attribute of QR code.If the QR code was not displayed, this text will be displayed instead.
Title attribute of QRcode: QR code title attribute. Displayed when hovering with the mouse as supplementary information of the QR code.
Show only administrator of download button:Set up the Show only administrator of download button. The setting is turned on, only the administrator will see the download button.

Shortcode

Embed type: You can choose QRcode or clicable icon.
Embed to file: Display the QR code anywhere in the theme folder.
Shortcode: Place the displayed shortcode at your desired location.
QR code background color: Hexadecimal is used to set the background color.
QR code color: Hexadecimal is used to set the color of the QR code.
QR code size: Set up the QR code size. It is unnecessary to enter a unit(px).
Alt attribute of QRcode: Alt attribute of QR code.If the QR code was not displayed, this text will be displayed instead.
Title attribute of QRcode: QR code title attribute. Displayed when hovering with the mouse as supplementary information of the QR code.
sections.reviews:
super handy!

By think238 on July 14, 2022

does exactly what it should. Thank you!

Very good plug-in, beautiful, simple and easy to use!

By link021 on April 21, 2022

Very good plug-in, beautiful, simple and easy to use!

Simple, elegant and efficient

By fbuenonet on December 29, 2020

It does what it says it does and does it well. It is simple in terms of functions and is very convenient when you want someone to share the page without the typical crawls of social networks.
